name: Ocean Sky Hotel & Resort

reviews.text: Excellent Staff: Great Valet Crew. We were here for four days and enjoyed the location on the beach & the heated pool. Rooms were very clean and had a fridge and micro. Overall excellent time and we will return.
reviews.title: Great Four Days !!

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay here ,as the hotel was very clean , Rooms were well maintained ,The pool was great to cool off in or the beach . There's a pool bar and very friendly staff. The hotel restaurant has good food.There are lots of other restaurants with in walking distance of the hotel,
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: We we're at Ocean Sky for one week. 2 adults 1 teen girl. We we're a little bit anxious because of all the bad reviews. But we we're very glad to see by ourselves than Ocean Sky is a great place to stay. It's clean and well maintained. Rooms are nice size and clean. We didn't have any problem with water pressure and the staff was nice. This is an old hotel, but it didn't mean it's not comfortable and pleasant. The location is really great within walking distance of many restaurants and services like McDonalds, Dunkin Donuts, Wings, CVS... All rooms have balcony with partial seaview. Nice pool and jacuzzi. Don't hesitate.
reviews.title: An old hotel well maintained

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I really enjoyed our recent vacation at the Ocean Sky resort. The staff was friendly and courteous. The rooms were a nice size, and very clean. I'm a neat freak when it comes to hotels and the bathroom had been scrubbed and every inch had been dusted. The beds were quite comfortable and the showers had nice water pressure. My husband has been here before, and said the glass on the balconies was all new. The balconies were nice and spacious and provided a great view of the ocean. The pool and pool area was large, as was the hot tub. The food at the restaurant was excellent as well.
reviews.title: Lovely Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One complaint is how loud the balconies door slam. I kept getting woken up by surrounding rooms going in and out of their balconies.
reviews.title: last night before flying home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small hotel in an area of hotels and condos. All rooms do not face the ocean (as is seen in the site's photo) and their advertised "ocean front" room is a room that has a window facing the ocean...not worth the extra $100 per night! If you do not have a car you will need to use public bus transportation if you want to go to downtown for shopping,restaurants,riverfront cruises, segway tour at the park, etc. Since the concierge had no info on the bus or the trolley (which was rarely in the area) we ventured out to find the bus stop. Thank goodness some people were waiting and told us to use bus #11...and it comes every 30 minutes. We used the bus to go to downtown and found the bus terminal to get a schedule. To get back to the Ocean Sky we took a taxi - $25!
reviews.title: Truly a "3-star"
A great stay
reviews.text: Pros or Cons about Ocean Sky? You decide:

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * no HD on the flatscreen TV - poor quality
reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING

reviews.text: * no complimentary coffee/tea (coffee machine was in room..no tea)
reviews.title: Very Good Service Overall

reviews.text: * no small tables by pool, chairs were very close together
reviews.title: Very inappropriate and disrespectful bar staff
Nightmare
reviews.text: Walked out after 10 minutes in this poor excuse for a three star hotel. Rooms were actually scary and hallways were worse. Will never use Priceline again! No one should pay more than $50/night for this place. If you don't care about safety, cleanliness or style, and just want to be on the beach, this is for you. I will say the valet staff was polite and didn't charge us the daily fee after we walked out.
Hotel is beautiful, but you are too far from the main area of town....had too take taxi or bus to get to beach shops and restaurants
reviews.title: Too far from everything

reviews.text: Lovely hotel and beach for a good price, but you will pay the difference in taxi fare....not in walking distance of anything
reviews.title: Great March Break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like many I was skeptical of this property on account of some poor reviews...dont believe them.
reviews.title: Great hotel on the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The overall service was very good. The room was fine. The mattresses a bit too soft, but no big deal. It was clean and well maintained. The location was perfect for a family..right on the beach with miles of sand in either direction. The pool was great. Not only will I reccommend the Ocean Sky, I would stay there again.
reviews.title: TY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the fifth consecutive year we have stayed at the Ocean Sky Hotel and Resort and things just keep getting better. The view of the Atlantic Ocean is amazing and you are practically sitting on the beach. Enjoy suntanning, water sports, tiki bar, beautiful pool and outside sauna while u look right at the ocean. Hotel has made wonderful improvements. Beautiful lobby, clean rooms, friendly staff, nice restaurant to eat in or outside. For the price....Enloy a great place everyone !
reviews.title: Fabulous View & Hotel For a Fabulous Price

reviews.text: booked for two nights and we actually left after one night and lost our money for the second night. I would rather loose $200 bucks than spend two nights in this dump. Tiny very very old bathrooms and beds were extrememly old and rooms outdated. it was like a plush old old hotel 6. i wouldnt stay here for free if i was offered.
reviews.title: horrible room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were booked in this hotel by our travel agent as a stop over after our flight UK-Miami and prior to joining our cruise ship in Fort Lauderdale.
reviews.title: Its average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was clean and the rooms of average size. There was a large function taking place when we arrived early evening but this did not create any problems.
reviews.title: Just OK

reviews.text: The check in was impersonal but quick. In view of the hotel function and our long flight we decided to walk out to get a meal. There is not many restaurants or bars readily available however within 15 minutes we found a reasonable place to get a drink and small meal.
reviews.title: You could not get any closer to the beach!!! Amazing location!!!

description: Located directly on the beach, Ocean Sky Hotel & Resort is perfectly situated minutes away from major attractions, restaurants and shopping. Newly renovated rooms are equipped with mini-refrigerators, microwaves, hair-dryers, in room safes, dataports and coffee-makers. All standard rooms have a side-oceanview, open air balcony. Oceanfront view, 1 bedroom suites are also available. Our large pool deck features an oversized jacuzzi, heated pool, tiki bar, watersports and cabanas. The resort also has an indoor/outdoor restaurant, fitness center, gift shop, nightclub and lobby bar.
